name: Yashaswi Kumar
about: Conceived and co-founded Knappily, the award-winning news and knowledge app that has now become India's highest-rated and much-loved current affairs app. Available on the Play Store, the App Store and the web, Knappily, with its unique 5W1H format, has largely lived up to its promise of making subject matter experts out of its users. It has been a great journey so far. So much so that every third review of Knappily, which also has the highest review/user ratio on Playstore, uses the adjective 'great' for this app.

posts.title: Sushant Singh Rajput’s death explained by quantum theory
When I met the self-made future of India

experience.title: Founder
experience.description: TestCracker is one of the leading test prep companies of Bangalore, with its innovative classroom and online test modules for CAT, IIT JEE and Civil Services Examination rapidly gaining traction and results.
experience.description_html: TestCracker is one of the leading test prep companies of Bangalore, with its innovative classroom and online test modules for CAT, IIT JEE and Civil Services Examination rapidly gaining traction and results. <!---->

experience.title: Senior Manager
experience.description: Part of the Hinduja Leadership Program (HLP). An elite program for the graduates from India's top five Bschools, HLP provides cross-functional opportunities with its work projects spanning multiple industries under Hinduja Group worldwide.
experience.description_html: Part of the Hinduja Leadership Program (HLP). An elite program for the graduates from India's top five Bschools, HLP provides cross-functional opportunities with its work projects spanning multiple industries under Hinduja Group worldwide. <!---->

experience.title: Assistant Manager
experience.description: Part of the Graduate Engineer Trainee (GET) batch of 2004. Worked on mission-critical projects such as the implementation of the Third Party Logistics (TPL) system, the integration of e-sourcing (reverse auctions) in the regular sourcing  process of Tata Motors (Commercial Vehicles) and vendor rationalization, which entailed the streamlining of the vendor pool of Tata Motors to drive efficiency and cut procurement costs.
